Name: BISSELL
Natural: The BISSELL EV675 Robot Vacuum features a Triple-Action Cleaning System with dual edge brushes, rotating brush roll, and strong suction. It adapts to carpets and hard floors, runs up to 100 minutes, and includes cliff sensors and remote-scheduled cleaning—ideal for pet owners and busy households.

Name: Miele
Natural: Miele offers a range of high-end robot vacuums with advanced features for efficient cleaning, available through their Miele Experience Centres across Canada. These products target premium users seeking quality craftsmanship and connected smart home integration.

Name: ILIFE
Natural: The ILIFE PX-F031 High Performance Filter 8-pack is compatible with A80 Max, A9, A10, and S8 Pro robot vacuums. Priced at $14.99, it's a cost-effective choice for users seeking reliable dust and allergen filtration for their ILIFE vacuum models.

Name: Samsung
Natural: The Samsung Bespoke Jet Bot AI+ uses Intel AI and 3D LiDAR to navigate intelligently, avoid obstacles, and personalize cleaning paths. With SmartThings integration and pet monitoring, it's ideal for tech-savvy users and pet owners wanting advanced floor care automation.

Name: Xiaomi
Natural: The Mi Robot Vacuum-Mop 2 combines 2700Pa suction, pressurized mopping, and smart navigation for deep cleaning. With a 110-minute battery life and app-controlled zoning, it suits users looking for efficient, customizable cleaning of medium to large homes.

Name: Eufy
Natural: The Eufy X10 Pro Omni features 8000Pa suction, sonic mopping, and a self-maintaining base that handles emptying, washing, drying, and refilling. Designed for full automation, it's ideal for hands-free users seeking premium cleaning at a competitive price.

Name: Ecovacs
Natural: The DEEBOT OZMO 920 offers simultaneous vacuuming and mopping, laser mapping, and customizable cleaning with Smart Navi 3.0. Its slim design and app control make it perfect for users needing quiet, efficient multi-floor cleaning with detailed scheduling.

Name: Shark
Natural: Shark’s Matrix™ Plus 2-in-1 series delivers deep carpet vacuuming and sonic mopping, with self-emptying, HEPA filtration, and corner-cleaning tech. With up to 120 minutes runtime and smart obstacle avoidance, it’s built for allergy-sensitive users and tech-forward homes.
